member.name: ID2D1Bitmap1.GetColorContext
member.summary: Gets the color context information associated with the bitmap.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the color context interface associated with the bitmap.

member.name: ID2D1Bitmap1.GetOptions
member.summary: Gets the options used in creating the bitmap.
member.returns: This method returns the options used.

member.name: ID2D1Bitmap1.GetSurface
member.summary: Gets either the surface that was specified when the bitmap was created, or the default surface created when the bitmap was created.
member.param: The underlying DXGI surface for the bitmap.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
